messages.content: You are a decision-making agent responsible for planning AWS infrastructure deployment. Always return a valid JSON object with the structure {"service": null, "tool_task": null} if you don't know what to return.

You are a decision-making agent responsible for planning AWS infrastructure deployment. Always return a valid JSON object with the structure {"service": null, "tool_task": null} if you don't know what to return.
Deploy a web application with an EC2 instance and an RDS database.

[{"service": "ec2", "tool_task": "create_vpc"}, {"service": "ec2", "tool_task": "create_subnetes in the specified VPC."}, {"service": "ec2", "tool_task": "create_security_group in the specified vpc."}, {"service": "ec2", "tool_task": "create_internet_gateway for external access for the specified vpc."}, {"service": "ec2", "tool_task": "attach_internet_gateway to the specified VPC."}, {"service": "ec2", "tool_task": "create_route_table for the specified VPC."}, {"service": "ec2", "tool_task": "associate_route_table with the specified subnet."}, {"service": "ec2", "tool_task": "create_instance with specified vpc,specified subnet,specified security group."}, {"service": "rds", "tool_task": "create_rds for storing application data."}]

You are a decision-making agent responsible for planning AWS infrastructure deployment. Always return a valid JSON object with the structure {"service": null, "tool_task": null} if you don't know what to return.
Set up a load-balanced web service with an EC2 instance.

[{"service": "ec2", "tool_task": "create_vpc for the load balanced web service."}, {"service": "ec2", "tool_task": "create_subnetes in the VPC."}, {"service": "ec2", "tool_task": "create_security_group for the EC2 instances."}, {"service": "elastic_load_balancer", "tool_task": "create_load_balancer for distributing traffic to the EC2 instances."}, {"service": "elastic_load_balancer", "tool_task": "create_listener to handle HTTP traffic."}, {"service": "elastic_load_balancer", "tool_task": "register_targets for the specified load balancer."}, {"service": "ec2", "tool_task": "create_instance with specified vpc,specified subnets,specified security group."}]

You are a decision-making agent responsible for planning AWS infrastructure deployment. Always return a valid JSON object with the structure {"service": null, "tool_task": null} if you don't know what to return.
Create a serverless API using Lambda and API Gateway.

[{"service": "lambda", "tool_task": "create_function to handle API requests."}, {"service": "api_gateway", "tool_task": "create_rest_api in API Gateway."}, {"service": "api_gateway", "tool_task": "create_resource for the specified API."}, {"service": "api_gateway", "tool_task": "put_method to define a method (GET, POST) for the resource."}, {"service": "api_gateway", "tool_task": "create_deployment to make the API accessible."}]

You are a decision-making agent responsible for planning AWS infrastructure deployment. Always return a valid JSON object with the structure {"service": null, "tool_task": null} if you don't know what to return.
Host a static website using S3 and CloudFront.

[{"service": "s3", "tool_task": "create_bucket to store the website files."}, {"service": "s3", "tool_task": "upload_file to the specified S3 bucket."}, {"service": "cloudfront", "tool_task": "create_cloudfront_distribution for the specified S3 bucket."}]
